1.label: Temperature on Change Reporting
1.description: 0: No on change reporting (only time-based reports) 1-50: report if temperature changed by delta = 0,1°C - 5,0°C Default: 5

2.label: Humidity on Change Reporting
2.description: 0: No on change reporting (only time-based reports) 1-10: report if humidity changed by delta = 1% ...10% Default: 5

3.label: Temperature Scale
3.description: Temperature in Degrees Celcius Temperature in Degrees Fahrenheit Default: Temperature in Degrees Celcius

4.label: Temperature Resolution
4.description: No resolution (example 22°C) 1/10 resolution (example 22.3°C) 1/100 resolution (example 22.35°C) Default: No resolution (example 22°C)

5.label: Humidity Resolution
5.description: No resolution (example 33%) 1/10 resolution (example 33.4%) 1/100 resolution (example 33.45% Default: No resolution (example 33%)

6.label: VOC on Change Reporting
6.description: 0: No on change reporting (only time-based reports) 1-10: report if VOC reading changed by 100ppb - 1000ppb Default: 5

7.label: CO2eq on Change Reporting
7.description: 0: No on change reporting (only time-based reports) 1-10: report if CO2eq reading changed by 100ppm - 1000ppm Default: 5

8.label: Air quality indication via LED
8.description: 0: No air quality indication via LEDs 1: Indicate measuered air quality via LEDs Default: 1

options.label: No air quality indication via LEDs
Indicate measuered air quality via LEDs
